args.subject: Summary of Shared Document
args.body:
Hi Lily, 

Here is the summary of the document you shared:

The document discusses the first meeting of the Book Club regarding 'The Great Gatsby'. It notes the participants' insights and announces that the next book for discussion will be 'The Old Man and the Sea'. An online resource is available at www.bookclub.com.

Best, 
Emma
